reviewText: I love Jurgen Ziewe's work.  This DVD does NOT play.  I bought it TWICE.  I've reported this to AMZ that they are selling a defective product.
We haven't been able to watch. It won't play on either of our DVDs players or on our computer. This is very frustrating! I bought this for my husband as a gift and it's too bad. We got a lemon.
Not descriptive as to what dvd was about.
I had perhaps too high of hopes for a film with such an auspicious title.  I applaud the effort that it must have taken to produce, and yet it had nothing to do with Samadhi.
There is so much love in this living enlightenment poem .Tears of joy is all A gave to say
